data.text:
@nowthisnews "While Covid-19 Skyrockets, Florida’s Gov. DeSantis And Surgeon General Ladapo Are Still Spreading Misinformation" (January 4, 2022)

https://t.co/TSFzsGFSME
@nowthisnews DeSantis always standing there to make sure they parrot his phrases. 😂
@nowthisnews Lesson: you can get a degree at Yale & Harvard and still be a dumbass.
@nowthisnews I recommend the immediate removal from office all current Republican state officials complicit in this horrible debacle.

@nowthisnews What is it with this  "promoting personal freedom" ? Most people who don't want to wear a mask, don't wear one.

And will advising against the use of face masks become a mandate where someone gets a citation or arrested for wearing one?

@swimmerbr78 @SgtSupply @nowthisnews Thanks for being the only person to respond rationally. Not a bad point, and while I don’t know if I agree w everything he says, the censorship of differing opinions is anathema to science
